archdesc.runner: Special Collections, Earl Gregg Swem Library, College of William and Mary

did.head: Overview of the Collection
did.abstract: This collection includes newsletters and technical reports from the Department of Computer Science at the College of William and Mary.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The collection is open to all researchers.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Before reproducing or quoting from any materials, in whole or in part, permission must be obtained from the Special Collections Research Center, and the holder of the copyright, if not Swem Library.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: College of William and Mary, Dept. of Computer Science Records, Special Collections Research Center, Earl Gregg Swem Library, College of William and Mary.

custodhist.head: Custodial History
custodhist.p: This collection was previously part of the University Archives Publications Collection.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Box and folder list compiled by Kelsey Kavanaugh, SCRC Staff, in April 2009.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: Computer Science studies the development of computer algorithms, data structures for representing and processing information, and the logical organization of computers themselves. Further information about this individual or organization may be available in the Special Collections Research Center Wiki: http://scrc.swem.wm.edu/wiki/index.php/Dept. of Computer Science.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection includes newsletters and technical reports from the Department of Computer Science at the College of William and Mary.

controlaccess.head: Index Terms
controlaccess.p: This Collection is indexed under the following controlled access subject terms.

controlaccess.head: Corporate Name:
controlaccess.corpname: College of William and Mary. Dept. of Computer Science
